job_description: We are seeking a Sr. POS/AEM ReactJS Developer with 5+ years of Front End experience, 5 years in a development role, and a strong passion for building great software to join our growing NextGen Point of Sale team. Leverages ReactJS as the primary JavaScript front end framework, focused on standing up and building brand new experiences on POS properties. They will be working in an Agile SAFe environment so a commitment to collaborative teamwork is essential.

Qualifications: Location: Remote but candidate must live in: MI, IL, IN, OH, KY, WI
Point of Sale and/or Payments development experience
3+ years experience with ReactJS (AngularJS acceptable depending on other skills)
Ability to write clean, modular, reusable code (using design patterns) and experience with unit-test driven approach to development
Ability to gather technical architecture from architects and leads as well as help build POS applications
Technical knowledge and experiences on corresponding technologies, help identify best practices of that tech stack
The ability to present technical concepts to technical and non-technical internal/external stakeholders
Responsibilities: They will be working in an Agile SAFe environment so a commitment to collaborative teamwork is essential
Participate in all phases of our Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Work with front-end technologies and frameworks
Follow best practices for secure programming and deployment
Ability to take ownership of a project and execute it with excellence
Translate requirements into high-quality, testable, scalable software
Identify performance issues and bugs, and devise solutions to these issues
Participate in team code reviews and design discussions
Work closely with Vendor partner to ensure sound practices regarding site architecture, performance and reliability, and content delivery are in place
Adhere to internal best practices with respect to coding standards, unit test coverage, automation, and continuous integration
Be a team player and collaborate with and train others in the organization as needed
Work in SAFe agile development methodology

job_naics_name: Internet Publishing and Broadcasting and Web Search Portals
job_title: Sr. POS/AEM React Developer : W2 Only
